description:
Kanade and Kyoya move to Seiso Academy and enter the orchestra club.  They are shocked by club-leader Ritsu’s announcement that they are candidates who would represent Seiso Academy in the national contest.  But other members are disgruntled, especially the first-year Cello player Mizushima Haruto, because they could not agree to an ensemble made of people whose abilities they know nothing of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 溜息とアヴェ・マリア
